data.eml:eml: The identity of the Neotropical stingless bee Frieseomelitta meadewaldoi (Cockerell, 1915) (Hymenoptera, Apidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Oliveira, Favizia Freitas de, Urban, Danuncia, Engel, Michael S. (2011): The identity of the Neotropical stingless bee Frieseomelitta meadewaldoi (Cockerell, 1915) (Hymenoptera, Apidae). ZooKeys 111: 19-31, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.111.1345, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.111.1345
